TopicTitle: Mk3 Passenger Fuselage with a cargo hold

Articles.Content:
My suggestion is simple: a Mk3 crew quarters with a cargo hold beneath with a door on one side that opened and closed by right click / action group, in a setup similar to many airliners. This could probably be accomplished while using the same IVA as the default Mk3 crew quarters.

Also, it may be helpful to some to have a version with and a version without a cargo door.

-Carlpilot

I think the Kossak from Lack's Stock Extension has something akin to that, but you may want to use the model, remove the area underneath, and add a hinge or whatever in Unity with the ModuleAnimateGeneric to handle the hinge.
